Literature.Title: Antimicrobially active cycloundecapeptides related to gramicidin S having a novel turn structure with cis D-Phe-Pro peptide bond.
Literature.Author: Tamaki M, Sasaki I, Kokuno M, Shindo M, Kimura M, Uchida Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis NBRC 3513(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 19213(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Escherichia coli NBRC 12734(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 3080(MIC=100µg/ml)
